channel.title: Shout out to our creators!
channel.description: February is a dangerous month for the wallet, but I'm seeing amazing things happening! Girl Underground, Codex Support Tiers, and just an amazing amount of 'zine creators coming out to make the TTRPG scene something beautiful and exciting! Kudos to you all!

item.title: Shout out to our creators!
item.dc:creator: @inarvan
item.description:
@inarvan wrote:

This entire couple of months is seriously dangerous for me on Kickstarter. There are so many worthy projects, and picking the ones that I can afford to back is nervewracking, but also kind of great.

Read full topic

item.title: Shout out to our creators!
item.dc:creator: @JimLikesGames
item.description:
@JimLikesGames wrote:

Also, Companions’ Tale just dropped, and Good Society is making its way into distribution. My store game-buying is waaaaaay up this month, looking forward to Dreamation and Pax East!

Read full topic
